description: The ListWorkersBlocks operation retrieves a list of Workers who are blocked from working on your HITs.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If the previous response was incomplete (because there is more data to retrieve), Amazon Mechanical Turk returns a pagination token in the response. You can use this pagination token to retrieve the next set of results.

nested_items.name: NumResults
nested_items.description: The number of assignments on the page in the filtered results list, equivalent to the number of assignments returned by this call.

nested_items.name: WorkerBlocks
nested_items.description: The list of WorkerBlocks, containing the collection of Worker IDs and reasons for blocking.

nested_items.name: WorkerId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Worker who accepted the HIT.

nested_items.name: Reason
nested_items.description: A message explaining the reason the Worker was blocked.
